io.limberest.api.validate.props

Interface PropertyValidator<T extends io.swagger.models.properties.Property>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatePropertyValidator, DateTimePropertyValidator, NumberPropertyValidator, StringPropertyValidator
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PropertyValidator<T extends io.swagger.models.properties.Property>
